Summary: observed brilliant white, glowing/pulsating orb like object...hovering....changed shape to much larger / brighter disc like object....never moved....still hovering.....and just disappeared in a clear blue sky...then reappeared in the same spot as an orb
divs: sighting details....i was driving north on route 93 in methuen mass....on my way to the methuen library....i was between exits 46 and 47....at approximately 2:25 - 2:30 p.m......when i observed looking out my drivers side window, a brilliant white \ pulsating spherical object at about 45 degrees, due west in a blue sky....i initially expected it was an aircraft reflecting the sun....but it never moved...never faded....and it was not like any other reflection off an aircraft i had ever seen before....this was way too bright...and pulsating...extremely bright...and hovering....stationary.....and then suddenly it just transformed to a larger, brighter...disc like object....just brilliant glowing white...in the same spot...it never moved....just stayed stationary....i was trying to get my son to see this thing....and was frustrated that he was looking off in the wrong direction...and then the object just vanished....it did not fly off....then as i was still explaining to my son where i saw it....as we were both looking, it just suddenly reappeared again..we both saw it this time....but as just the brilliant white orb i saw initially....it was only there momentarily, and then just vanished....it did not fly off...it just vanished....the sun was not in line with this object....it was off to the left and behind....and really not in the viewing field....when my son and i reached the methuen library...our original destination....we stood outside the car, and watched the sky for a period of time and never saw the object again.....we never saw any aircraft in the area....nothing at all....i am reporting this in the hope that maybe somebody else in the area saw this as well....it was such a beautiful \ brilliant white object....and i would like an explanation for this....and the shape change....there was quite a bit of traffic at the time...so the odds are pretty good somebody else saw this as well....as far as my feelings about this sighting ...??....well...i'm really puzzled by it....i know this was no airplane...or helicopter...or blimp....they can't simply disappear in a clear blue sky....or change shape...so...i guess i feel somewhat like a nut here...but i saw what i saw....and so did my son....wish i could say ....or had more info....but this is it....
